extendedInfo.description: The rule of LogicBall is very simple, all you have to do is bring the ball to the hole.Level of difficulty is growing extremly fast and only part of humanity can complete this game.30 unique levels are waiting to beat your brain!If you have enough skills you can design your own level. If it will be good it has chance to be in future versions of the game.###Keywords:logic ball, logic, ball

reviews.title: A Mistaken Idea of Logic
reviews.comment: Is it logic or redundant pathfinding? The game is a breeze through of following a linear pattern of predetermined path to the hole on the maps.  There are no dynamic elements, the ball will move straight until colliding with a wall, until level 6 the \"game\" goes  from misleading you into thinking you\'re smart, then having you slide  that ball into every combination of placed walls until you realize this is not logic, this is redundant trial and error that better suits an AI. Likely not worth your  time.
reviews.author: A Google User
